name: Toonmodernism® Shortcuts App Figma Art
description:
I love Figma and this project is the Proof of my love. All done in Figma without raster elements. 100% Figma Editable Vector


This art for iOS Mobile App was created based on my feelings about overall trend in visual design.

Due to my sympathy to Metamodernism I've decided to call it Toonmodernism®. What do you think of it?

Animation done as a Live Prototype in Origami Studio.


Press Like Save & Follow :)
